testimonialsSummary.solutionsMentored:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the count of solutions mentored
**UI Location**: Profile page → Testimonials section → Stats block
**When Users See This**: Always visible in the Testimonials summary
**Technical Context**: Displays a metric associated with a number; no variables
**Current English**: "Solutions mentored"
testimonialsSummary.studentsHelped:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the count of students helped
**UI Location**: Profile page → Testimonials section → Stats block
**When Users See This**: Always visible in the Testimonials summary
**Technical Context**: Displays a metric associated with a number; no variables
**Current English**: "Students helped"
testimonialsSummary.testimonialsReceived:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the count of testimonials received
**UI Location**: Profile page → Testimonials section → Stats block
**When Users See This**: Always visible in the Testimonials summary
**Technical Context**: Displays a metric associated with a number; no variables
**Current English**: "Testimonials received"
testimonialsSummary.seeAllOfHandleTestim:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to view all testimonials for a specific user
**UI Location**: Profile page → Testimonials section (bottom link)
**When Users See This**: When the 'links.all' prop is provided, at the bottom of the Testimonials section
**Technical Context**: Variable `handle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "See all of {handle}'s testimonials"
